text:
Havenly - Denver, CO - http://www.havenly.com

Havenly is an innovative online interior design studio that makes beautiful d√©cor convenient and accessible for clients. The Havenly process starts with a style profile that matches clients with their ideal interior designer. A personal designer then works with Havenly clients (via a phone call or online questionnaire) to create stunning room concepts along with a shopping list of items for a low $199 per room fee.

Our software stack is lovingly built with: Linux, Docker, PHP, MySQL, and [TBD javascript framework, currently just jQuery].

We're a fun group with a unique culture (I'm currently the only male employee and I'm crossing my fingers I can find some male software engineers).

We're currently looking for: software engineers who are passionate about building a beautiful product that delights your users.
